sys_element_mapping.value:
The NCC is in need of extra documents for your agreement Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Number:

  1. Proof of Insurance
  2. Plans
  3. Proof of ID

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: State is set to Proceed with Agreement.

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time
